thread.title: Pete Souza, Obama's photographer, takes subtle digs at Trump on Instagram – video
thread.title_full: Pete Souza, Obama's photographer, takes subtle digs at Trump on Instagram – video

author: Guardian Staff
title: Pete Souza, Obama's photographer, takes subtle digs at Trump on Instagram – video
text:
Obama administration Pete Souza, Obama's photographer, takes subtle digs at Trump on Instagram – video 
Pete Souza, the former chief photographer for Barack Obama in the White House, appears to be attempting to troll Donald Trump on Instagram. Every Thursday Souza posts a photo from his time behind the scenes at the White House – and they tend to be directly related to something Obama’s successor has just done
